# Tender for Laser Test on Cameras
## Tender Details
Reference Number: PW-23-01028068
Solicitation Number: 2022-13311
**Publication Date:** February 28, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 13, 2023, at 2:00 PM
Tender Status: Expired

## Goods and Services Information
Procurement Category: Government of Canada (List I)
Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering

## Supplier Information
Only suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada are eligible to bid.

## Contract Requirements
Defense Research and Development Canada (DRDC)-Valcartier Research Centre requires the performance of laser tests on various camera technologies. The tests will involve the use of:

* Silicon cameras (monochromatic and color)
* Indium gallium arsenide cameras
* Indium antimonide cameras

The work will involve assessing and validating cameras using a mid-infrared laser source that must be a ruggedized single-mode fibre laser emitting around 2.8 microns.

## Evaluation Criteria
The mandatory technical criteria for the evaluation of bids are:

* Compliance with the requirements specified in the tender document
* The lowest aggregate price offered by a supplier who is already holding a Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada.
